rows.label: qev055502_MSG0001
rows.name:
This... What is this? Will it do me harm? Danger...
It is dangerous. I am in danger... Please help...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0002
rows.name: My head...aches. It feels ready to split in two...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0003
rows.name: I...know you. Help me. Please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0004
rows.name:
You have saved my life.
I must thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0005
rows.name:
Aaaaah! I still feel as if something is inside my head!
What IS this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev055502_SEL0011
rows.name: Say the will of the Ovah resides inside the Orphe.

rows.label: qev055502_JNK0020
rows.name: Reassure

rows.label: qev055502_SEL0021
rows.name: Try to calm the confused Orphean.

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0006
rows.name:
Then...this is normal for the Orphe?
The will of the Ovah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0007
rows.name:
Thank you for your concern. I am all right.
I am feeling much calmer now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0008
rows.name:
I understand now that I am a member of the Orphe,
while you are of a race called humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0009
rows.name:
But why am I here?
Was I led by the Ovah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0010
rows.name:
It is strange...
I do not seem to have a name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_JNK0110
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev055502_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that she can work that out in the safety of NLA.

rows.label: qev055502_JNK0120
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev055502_SEL0121
rows.name: Say that she is a new type, according to her parent.

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0011
rows.name: Yes, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0012
rows.name:
I must speak with my parent.
Let us return to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0013
rows.name:
My...parent? I see.
So I split off from another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055502_MSG0014
rows.name:
There is much I would like to ask him.
Let us hurry back to the city.[ST:wait ]
